Document:
# Core Rule 0 - Losing is part of the game.
- Rule 0 should be represented by the way you play the game.
- It is not a fair game, and it is important to play with a positive attitude, even when things do not go your way.
- Understand this and try to keep deadchat malding and complaining to a minimum. You will have more chances to do what you wanted to do.
